id: # Full Access for TMS Admin Group
# The Admin has full CRUD permissions on all TMS models for system management.
# Fulfills REQ-1-101: Dispatch Manager has permissions for operational tasks.
# Full control on financial data (Cards). Read/Write on expenses for approval.
# Read-only on operational data. Denied trip creation.
# Fulfills REQ-1-101: Finance Officer has permissions to manage financial lifecycle but denied permissions to create or dispatch trips.
# Highly restricted access. Read on their own trips. Create/Read/Update on own expenses.
# Create/Read on events and PODs. Read on assigned vehicle documents.
# Fulfills REQ-1-100: Strict data segregation for the 'Driver' role.
# Drivers can see their own employee record
